```
version: "3"
services:
  server:
    build:
      context: ./server
      dockerfile: Dockerfile-server
```

```
version: "3"
services:
  server:
    image: nginx
  db:
    image: postgres
    ports:
      - "8032:5432"
```

```
version: "3"
services:
  database:
    image: my-db-service
    volumes:
      - data:/database
  backup:
    image: my-backup-service
    volumes:
      - data:/backup
volumes:
  data:
```

``` #!/usr/bin/env sh rm /data/index.html echo "

Welcome from Docker Compose!

" >> /data/index.html echo "" >> /data/index.html ```

```
    FROM busybox
    ADD prepare.sh /usr/bin/prepare.sh
    RUN chmod +x /usr/bin/prepare.sh
    ENTRYPOINT ["sh", "/usr/bin/prepare.sh"] 
    ```

```
    version: "3"
    services:
      init:
        build:
          context: ./init
        volumes:
          - static:/data

      server:
        image: nginx
        volumes:
          - static:/usr/share/nginx/html  
        ports:
          - "8080:80"
    volumes:
      static:
    ```

```
    version: "3"
    services:
      print:
        image: busybox
        command: sh -c 'sleep 5 && env'
        env_file:
        - print.env
        environment:
        - ENV_FROM_COMPOSE_FILE=HELLO
        - ENV_FROM_SHELL
    ```

```
version: "3"
services:
  init:
    image: busybox
  pre:
    image: busybox
    depends_on:
    - "init"
  main:
    image: busybox
    depends_on:
    - "pre"
```

```
    version: "3"
    services:
      clean:
        image: busybox
        command: "rm -rf /static/index.html"
        volumes:
          - static:/static 
      init:
        image: busybox
        command: "sh -c 'echo This is from init container >>       /static/index.html'"
        volumes:
          - static:/static 
        depends_on:
        - "clean"
      pre:
        image: busybox
        command: "sh -c 'echo This is from pre container >>       /static/index.html'"
        volumes:
          - static:/static 
        depends_on:
        - "init"
      server:
        image: nginx
        volumes:
          - static:/usr/share/nginx/html  
        ports:
          - "8080:80"
        depends_on:
        - "pre"
    volumes:
      static:
    ```
